application

Class Controller

  • java.lang.Object
    • application.Controller

  • public class Controller
extends java.lang.Object
    Controller This class serves as a controller for our program and takes care of all the user actions. It is modified from our assignment 2 code.
    Author:
    Clayton Jian, Eoin Coll

    • Method Detail

      • openImage

        protected void openImage(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
                  throws java.lang.InterruptedException
        openImage This method is used to display a open dialog window for the user to select their video and to display an error if the file is not a video
        Parameters:
        event - a user click event on the "Open" button
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException - if button press is interrupted

      • stiByCopyingPixels

        protected void stiByCopyingPixels(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
                           throws java.lang.Exception
        stiByCopyingPixels This method is used to perform the STI generation by copying pixels based on the user's requirement. It also opens the STI in a new window to be viewed.
        Parameters:
        event - user click event on the "STI by Copying Pixels" button
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if output image file cannot be found

      • stiByHistogramDifferences

        protected void stiByHistogramDifferences(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
                                  throws java.lang.Exception
        stiByHistogramDifferences This method is used to perform the STI generation by histogram differences.
        Parameters:
        event - a user click event on the "STI by Histogram Differences" button
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if output image file cannot be found

      • displayImage

        protected void displayImage(java.lang.String fileName,
                            java.lang.String methodName)
                     throws java.lang.Exception
        displayImage This method is used to display the STI that was created
        Parameters:
        fileName - the name of the STI picture
        methodName - the name of the STI method used
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if image is not found

      • createFrameGrabber

        protected void createFrameGrabber(double curFrameNumber,
                                  double totFrameCount)
                           throws java.lang.InterruptedException
        createFrameGrabber This method is used to display the video that the user has selected.
        Parameters:
        curFrameNumber - the current frame number, initialized at 0
        totFrameCount - the total frame count, initialized at 0
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException - if video playback is interrupted
